item.title: NATO nations deploy to Greenland after tense White House talks
item.description: The joint NATO exercise comes shortly after tense talks between officials representing the U.S., Denmark and Greenland.

item.title: Iran reopens airspace after hours-long shutdown spooks airlines
item.description: Iran temporarily closed most of its airspace late Wednesday, forcing airlines to reroute flights as tensions with the United States escalated.
